message: Bob, I'm excited about the potential of this product in your hands.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1,250,000. This reflects its value, but also acknowledges our shared desire to see this product succeed. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,100,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I recognize the value you place on this product, I'm still not able to come down to $1,100,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,150,000?  This would allow us both to secure a good deal.  Let's see if we can make this work.

I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,125,000. I hope this proposal will help us reach an agreement that is acceptable to both of us.
